issue.title: Frequent escalate to SIGKILL on shutdown

content.raw:
We have seen this problem. The downstream issue ticket is here: https://github.com/utexas-bwi/bwi-update/issues/6

The delay is not that important, except that it sometimes prompts new users to issue their own terminate signal with C-\\. That leaves gzserver running, which causes all subsequent gazebo invocations to fail.
